basics.name: Noe Martinez
basics.label: Sr Java developer
basics.summary: I have been working for 17 years with java technologies. I got several java certifications, I really like to learn new technologies

work.name: eDreams ODIGEO
work.summary:
I worked in the e-commerce platform of the travel agency, after some time I was moved to a
new team to continue the development of the user search for flights as a different service
from the main platform after some time I worked in the refactor to simplify the flow to  make the flight searches. I worked on a new proposal with micronaut as an alternative to the current jee stack and also helped with the proposal with spring-boot. I managed to test micronaut in production (just 10% traffic). I  worked with microservices, rest, docker, google cloud, kafka, jboss, java, micronaut, spring-boot

work.name: Globant
work.summary:
My experience includes working with java collection framework to improve the code in a web application; also I have worked with Threads and ExecutorServices to improve the performance of the application. Use of git as version control.
I worked with a java web application with several java frameworks as spring, hibernate, freemarker, and the javascript frameworks backbone and highcharts, I added new functionality to this application. I developed a process to send email notifications. I needed to learn about Oracle business intelligence 11 because the application reads data through it. I developed REST services with jersey and spring. I worked with an international team (Spain, Colombia, Argentina, Mexico). I developed some process using cloud computing (rackspace queue, rackspace file storage, and gloogle cloud storage). I worked with redis and spring to cache some resources.
work.location: Ciudad de México y alrededores, México

work.name: Winter
work.summary: I have worked in web applications with primefaces, mybatis and spring with oracle database; I developed a materialized view in oracle to improve some reports of the application. I improve some reports made with birt (eclipse report tool). I'm working in web application with primefaces, jsf2, hibernate, ms sqlserver, tomcat

work.name: Grupo Tradeco
work.summary: I developed a process to pre - calculate a payment payroll of employees also some reports of the payments. I worked on implementing sso (single sing on) with jasig-cas and different applications on java and php, I changed projects to maven structure and also I developed an archetype to create the structure of new projects. I participated in the development of a module for management and authentication of users.

work.name: Strategysys
work.summary: I had to improve the code for processing large xml file, update database in batch mode with huge information through internal framework for batch processing and I did research about spring batch as an alternative. I developed some reports with jasperreports, also I reviewed and fixed some minor problems in web applications with springmvc and wicket, I configured some jms in weblogic and ssl with apache and glassfish.

work.name: Aspel
work.summary: I fixed code according new client requirements; also I developed new modules for the system.  Solved different problems in the application through implementing design patterns, in a swing application I implemented  singleton  pattern in the connection to the data base, I developed one applet to print files that are generated in the server side and the clients print it in their own printers

work.name: Interconsoulting Solutions
work.summary: I fixed code in web applications and I developed new functionality in some projects, I started to work with java web applications and some frameworks such as hibernate, struts and spring
